description:
Emily`s Nidoran♀ is nicknamed Maria and is dressed by Emily in an orange bow.
Ralph`s Nidoran♂ fell in love with Emily`s Nidoran♀ however were not allowed to see each other much because Ralph and Emily were not on good terms.
It was not until Jessie, James and Meowth stole both the Nidoran that they decided to work together so they good team up against Team Rocket. When Mary and Ralph`s Nidoran♂ kissed after being reunited, Maria evolved into Nidorina and Ralph`s Nidoran♂ evolved into Nidorino.
name: Nidoran (Emily)
